archimate:Requirement.name: SC-28(2): Protection of Information at Rest | Offline Storage
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Remove the following information from online storage and store offline in a secure location: [Assignment: organization-defined information].

properties.value: Removing organizational information from online storage to offline storage eliminates the possibility of individuals gaining unauthorized access to the information through a network. Therefore, organizations may choose to move information to offline storage in lieu of protecting such information in online storage.
